data.title: Quinton Anderson Reynolds' biography: who is Burt Reynolds’ son?
data.meta_description: Discover Hollywood stars who adopted Quinton Anderson Reynolds. The article also unveils Burt Reynolds’ son's career, why he was omitted from the actor's will, etc.
data.text:
Quinton Anderson Reynolds is an American digital image technician, editor, camera assistant, and post-production assistant. Despite being the son of Loni Anderson (actress) and the late Burton Reynolds (actor), Quinton never asked his parents to help him with his Hollywood career, and unlike them, he prefers to work behind the scenes. He leads a private life but is occasionally in the spotlight due to major family issues like his parents' divorce and his dad's will.

Quinton Anderson Reynolds grew up in the limelight and occasionally accompanied his parents to events. Even though Loni Anderson and Burton Reynolds were not his biological parents, they always treated him well. As a result, Quinton was devastated when he lost his father to a heart attack in 2018. You can read further information regarding Burt Reynolds' son's career and the will below.

Profile summary

(75 kg)Eye colorBrownHair colorBlackFatherThe late Burton Leon Reynolds Jr.MotherLoni Kaye AndersonSisterDeidra HoffmanMaternal grandparentsMaxine Hazel Kallin and Klaydon Carl "Andy" AndersonPaternal grandparentsFern H. Reynolds and Burton Milo Reynolds Sr.Marital statusSingleAlma materCalifornia State UniversityQualificationDegree in artsProfessionCamera operator, editor, and digital imaging technicianNet worth$800,000 (approx.)

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds is a camera operator, editor, post-production assistant, and digital image technician. Many also know him as the son of the late American actor Burt Reynolds. Quinton has been working in Hollywood since 2011.

How old is Quinton Anderson Reynolds?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' age is 35 years old as of 2023. He was born on 31st August 1988 in California, USA.

What is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' ethnicity?

He is an American national of a White ethnic background.

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' mother?

His mother, Loni Kaye Anderson, is a renowned American actress. She played the role of Steve McQueen in her debut film Nevada Smith (1966) and became a global star after acting as Jennifer Marlowe on the CBS sitcom WKRP in Cincinnati (1978–1982). The role enabled her to receive three Golden Globe Award nominations and two Emmy nominations.

The American actress is on her fourth marriage. She married her current husband, Bob Flick, in 2008. Before him, Loni was married to Burt Reynolds (1988–1994), Ross Bickell (1974–1981), and Bruce Hasselberg (1964–1966).

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' father?

Quinton's father, Burton Leon Reynolds Jr., was an icon of 1970s American popular culture. He is known for starring in Gunsmoke (1962–1965), Hawk (1966), and Dan August (1970–1971) television series and acting in films like "The Longest Yard (2005) and Broken Bridges (2006).

Did Burt Reynolds adopt his son?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds was three days old when Burt Reynolds and Loni Kaye Anderson adopted him in 1988. The couple was married between 29th April 1988 to 17th June 1994. After their separation, Quinton lived with his mother in California.

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' sister?

His sister is called Deidra Hoffman (born Dedra Kaye Hasselberg). Quinton Anderson Reynolds' mother, actress Loni Kaye Anderson, had Deidra with her first husband, Bruce Hasselberg. Burt Reynolds (Quinton Anderson Reynolds' father) was her third spouse.

Who are Quinton Anderson Reynolds' grandparents?

His maternal grandparents (Loni Kaye Anderson's parents) are Maxine Hazel Kallin and Klaydon Carl "Andy" Anderson. Meanwhile, his paternal grandparents (Burt Reynolds' parents) are Fern H. Reynolds and Burton Milo Reynolds Sr.

Klaydon Carl "Andy" Anderson (born in 1922 and died in 1977) was an environmental chemist, while his wife, Maxine Hazel Kallin (born in 1924 and died in 1985), was a famous model. On the other hand, Burton Reynolds Sr. (born in 1906 and died in 2002) was a police chief and a World War II. His wife, Harriet Fernette, died in 1996.

Who is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' biological father?

Quinton and his family have never said a word about his biological father to the public. The public only knows he is the adopted son of American actress Loni Anderson and actor Burt Reynolds.

How many kids did Burt Reynolds have?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds is the only child of the late American actor. After parting ways with Quiton's mum, Loni Anderson, Burt married English actress Judy Carne in 1963 and divorced in 1965 without having a child with her.

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' educational background

Burt Reynolds’ son attended elementary and high schools in California, then proceeded to California State University, where he pursued a degree in arts.

Quinton Anderson Reynolds' career

Since Quinton's parents exposed him to the TV and film industry from childhood, it did not surprise many when they discovered he works in Holywood, even though he is in front of the camera like them.

What does Quinton Anderson Reynolds do for a living?

He is a camera operator, editor, digital image technician, and post-production assistant. Quinton has worked on numerous shows and movies, including Ouija: Origin of Evil (2016), Tales of Halloween (2015), and Officer Downe (2016).

Furthermore, the film production expert has 24 editorial credits and 34 credits in the camera and electrical department. Some of these are listed below.

What is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' net worth?

Quinton Anderson Reynolds is worth around $800,000. Most of his wealth comes from his trust fund and Hollywood career as a camera operator, editor, digital image technician, and post-production assistant.

Quinton's mother's net worth is about $12 million. Meanwhile, his father's net worth dropped from the $60 million he had at his career peak to around $5 million at his death. The actor was very open about his money problems.

During the height of his career, Reynolds would earn around $10 million annually. Instead of financial growth, his poor business investments in the restaurant industry made him lose about $20 million.

When the actor fell into over $10 million debt, the situation forced him to file for bankruptcy in 1996. Besides his flawed business decisions, Reynolds went broke because his divorce from Loni Anderson affected his career.

The actor's earnings declined when CBS canceled his American sitcom, Evening Shade, due to bad publicity from the bitter divorce. Also, the chunks of money Reynolds spent on the divorce settlement, $15,000 child support payments for Quinton, and Loni's alimony payments strained him financially in the mid-1990s.

What happened to Quinton Reynolds?

Quinton was exempted from his Burt Reynolds' will, which the actor wrote in 2011. The document was made public after Burt's demise on 6th September 2018 at the Jupiter Medical Center in Florida.

Why did Burt Reynolds leave Quinton out of his will?

Reynolds left his estate to his niece, Nancy Lee Brown Hess, and most likely omitted Quinton from the will because he had already made a trust for him in 2005.

Did Burt Reynolds leave his son money?

Reynolds did not leave Quinton his wealth directly under a will. Instead, the actor created a trust for his son. Quinton reportedly receives money from the trust, which may have been formed to avoid estate taxes.

Where is Quinton Anderson Reynolds today?

Burt Reynolds’ son works as a camera operator, editor, digital image technician, and post-production assistant in Hollywood.

Is Quinton Reynolds married?

Hollywood digital image technician Quinton is unmarried and keeps his love life private.

What is Quinton Anderson Reynolds' height?

Burt Reynolds' son is 5' 10" (178 centimeters) tall.

Facts about Quinton Anderson Reynolds

Quinton is Loni Anderson and Burt Reynolds' adopted son.

He is the only child of Burt Reynolds and Loni Anderson

Quinton has an elder sister through his mother, Loni Anderson.

Burt Reynold's son is not on social media.

The world will always remember Quinton Anderson Reynolds as Burt Reynolds’ son. The late actor was always proud of him for not living off his parents' glory. Instead, Quinton independently established his career in Hollywood without Burt Reynolds and Loni Anderson’s help.

Legit.ng published Jermelle Simon’s biography. Many know this American actor for his roles in The Upshaws (2021-2023), Sojourn (2018), Animal Kingdom (2017), and Tattoo Nightmares (2013).

His career started in 2011 by acting as Chase Jones in the Why We Pray movie. Besides acting, Simon is a film producer and fitness coach. He is credited for producing the movie Aged Out.

Source: Legit.ng
